item.description: Today marks the end of my summer holidays (for the most part).

item.title: Joining BlueSky
item.description: After reading this article in The Atlantic I think it’s time to jump ship on Twitter.

item.title: A Standing Call for Songs to Sing at Music Conferences
item.description: I have always wanted to assemble a small book of easy enough to sight-sing songs for academic music conferences.
